content:
Welcome to the world of art! I'd be delighted to help you explore local classes or studios that offer beginner classes in painting or photography. However, I need a bit more information from you.

Could you please share your location or the city you're in? That way, I can provide you with more tailored recommendations.

Regarding the book, I'm glad you returned it to Emily! "The Nightingale" is a wonderful novel, and I'm sure she'll appreciate getting it back.

Once I have your location, I can suggest some local classes or studios that might interest you.
